# Government Tender Announcement: F3065-221755 - Refit Fall 2022 - CCGS Pierre Radisson

## Project Details

* Reference Number: WS3647975906-Doc3647999297
* Solicitation Number: WS3647975906
* Publication Date: September 14, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: **Cancelled**

## Project Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals from qualified contractors to carry out refit and repair works on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (C.C.G.S.) Pierre Radisson in Quebec City, Quebec, Canada.

## Description of Work

The scope of work includes:

* Carrying out refit and repair works in accordance with the Technical Specifications attached as Annex A and all related drawings.
* Identifying and addressing any unscheduled work not covered in the Technical Specifications.

## Instructions for Proposals

Proposals must be submitted by [**Cancelled due to amendment**] *..., all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EDT on October 6, 2022.* Bids submitted after this date and time will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

## Contract Information

* Expected Start Date: October 11, 2022
* Expected End Date: October 17, 2023
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Location: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Steve Simoneau
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Phone: (No phone number provided)
Email: [steve.simoneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:steve.simoneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Additional Information

This tender opportunity is covered by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (C.C.G.S.) Pierre Radisson project is related to the icebreaker sector.
